Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: The dried herbs smell with a heady earthy mixture of sweet and savory. It is a mottled pattern of green and brown.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[M] EmitTo( \$actor, "You take a bite of the herbs, and a tingling sensation fills your mouth. Within a few moments your vision blurs, and your thoughts drift in a euphoric haze. You feel relaxed and excited, everything is sensitive and wonderful. \\n OOC: You're now under the influence of an intoxicating, sensory increasing, mild hallucinogenic substance, Role-play accordingly. One half hour for every herb injested."); EmitIn( \$actor."base:environment", ""+Describe(\$actor)+ " places the leaf in" + \$actor."base:possessive" + " mouth and chews. After a moment, " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " eyes glaze over slightly, and a euphoric smile creeps across " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " lips.", \$actor );

X[M] EmitTo( \$actor, "You bite into the herbs, and a tingling sensation fills your mouth. Within a few moments your vision blurs, and your thoughts drift in a euphoric haze. You feel relaxed and excited, everything is sensitive and wonderful. \\n OOC: You're now under the influence of an intoxicating, sensory increasing, mild hallucinogenic substance, Role-play accordingly. One half hour for every herb injested."); EmitIn( \$actor."base:environment", ""+Describe(\$actor)+ " takes a bite of the leaf into " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " mouth and chews. After a moment, " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " eyes glaze over slightly, and a euphoric smile creeps across " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " lips.", \$actor );

X[M] EmitTo( \$actor, "As you crush your herbs they give off a strong tangy earthy scent."); EmitIn( \$actor."base:environment", ""+Describe(\$actor)+ " crushes " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " leaf. It gives off a strong tangy earthy scent.", \$actor );

X[M] EmitTo( \$actor, "You nibble the herbs, and a tingling sensation fills your mouth. Within a few moments your vision blurs, and your thoughts drift in a euphoric haze. You feel relaxed and excited, everything is sensitive and wonderful. \\n OOC: You're now under the influence of an intoxicating, sensory increasing, mild hallucinogenic substance, Role-play accordingly. One half hour for every herb injested."); EmitIn( \$actor."base:environment", ""+Describe(\$actor)+ " nibbles one of the leaves in " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " possession and chews. After a moment, " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " eyes glaze over slightly, and a euphoric smile creeps across " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " lips.", \$actor );
X[M] EmitTo( \$actor, "It has a pleasant earthy scent."); EmitIn( \$actor."base:environment", ""+Describe(\$actor)+ " smells " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " bunch of leaves.", \$actor );
X[M] EmitTo( \$actor, "It has a pleasant earthy scent."); EmitIn( \$actor."base:environment", ""+Describe(\$actor)+ " sniffs " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " bunch of leaves.", \$actor );

X[M] EmitTo( \$actor, "It has a pleasant tangy taste and your lips and tongue tingle slightly."); EmitIn( \$actor."base:environment", ""+Describe(\$actor)+ " tastes " + \$actor."base:possessive" + " bunch of leaves.", \$actor );
